name: Mehdi Norouzi
content: Expert Profile: Mehdi Norouzi | Research Directory Mehdi Norouzi Associate Professor Educator 513-549-3435EmailDownload V-Card Video Structure Analysis - Deep Video Understanding: 1) Video Temporal segmentation, Video Chaptering, Video Scene Detection 2) Video Summarization, Key-frame/Key-shot extraction 3) Dense Caption Generation, Language-guided video summarization Methods: Supervised sequence modeling using BiLSTMs and Transformers, Unsupervised modeling using VAE-GANs and Diffusion Models Applications: Medical Video Processing - Endoscopic Surgeries.
